answers.answer: Hi!I am sorry to hear about your medical problems.  Painfully cold leg and feet can be a symptom of MS. There are a few other possibilities like hypothyroidism, peripheral neuropathy like in diabetes, peripheral vascular disease, Reynaud’s phenomenon and very cold external temperatures. Please consult your doctor regarding this. Take care!The medical advice given should not be considered a substitute for medical care provided by a doctor who can examine you. The advice may not be completely correct for you as the doctor cannot examine you and does not know your complete medical history. Hence this reply to your post should only be considered as a guiding line and you must consult your doctor at the earliest for your medical problem.

question: I was diagnosed with MS in 2011. I am familiar with most of my symptoms but a new thing has started & it is this extremely coldness in my legs. I have yet to find comfort or warmth for them. It is painful
title: Cold
